author: superbonaci
body:
PS7:
````
PS C:\> Wpeutil
Wpeutil: The term 'Wpeutil' is not recognized as the name of a cmdlet, function, script file, or operable program.
Check the spelling of the name, or if a path was included, verify that the path is correct and try again.
````

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: @superbonaci sounds like it's missing from your PATH. If you have something in your Windows PowerShell profile that's adding PATH entries (or removing any from PS7) you'll need to add it to PowerShell 7's profile(s) as well.

comments.author: jcotton42
comments.body: `wpeutil` is only available in Windows PE, not normal Windows. If you ran into this issue while using WinPE then please indicate the version of Windows PE that you're having this issue in.

comments.author: superbonaci
comments.body: I'm on normal windows, not PE.

comments.author: jcotton42
comments.body: Then PowerShell can't find it because it isn't available on that configuration of Windows.

title: Wpeutil not available
